page.title: 20CAERWYS SCHOOL.
page.content: We are 90 pupils,4 teachers, a nursery nurse, 5 canteen staff,caretaker and secretary.Our pets are a guinea pig called Pinky and a black rabbit called Perky.At 9 a.m. we have assembly then we usually have either Welsh or Scripture, followed by Maths and English. During the afternoon we may have Art, Drama,Project work,sports etc. School closes 3 p.m. for Infants and 3.15 p.m. for Juniors.
